question: Which two countries fought the "War of 41"?
explanation: The War of 41, also known as the Ecuadorian-Peruvian War, was fought between Ecuador and Peru from 5 July 1941 to 31 January 1942. It was a border war which was the first of three military conflicts between Ecuador and Peru. This war resulted in the Peruvian victory which leads to the signing of Rio Protocol as a ceasefire agreement.
